mapper.select: SELECT sh_code as shcode,sh_name as shName,sh_type as shType, sh_addr as shaddr,sh_tel as shTel, COUNT(SIA.sia_abcode) AS workman FROM SH INNER JOIN SIA ON sia.sia_shcode = sh.sh_code where SH_MNCODE = '10000000' group by sh.sh_code,sh.sh_addr,sh.sh_businessli,sh.sh_tel,sh.sh_type,sh.sh_name

SELECT SIA_SHCODE AS "SHCODE", SIA_ABCODE AS "ABCODE", AB_GENDER AS "ABGENDER", AB_NAME AS "ABNAME", AB_BIRTH AS "ABBIRTH", AB_PHONE AS "ABPHONE", AB_EMAIL AS "ABEMAIL", AB_ADDR AS "ABADDR", SIA_ACCOUNT AS "SSACCOUNT", SIA_BANKNAME AS "SSBANKNAME", TO_CHAR(SIA_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS "SIADATE", SIA_PAY AS "SIAPAY" FROM SIA INNER JOIN AB ON SIA.SIA_ABCODE = AB.AB_CODE WHERE SIA_SHCODE = #{shCode} AND SIA_ABCODE = #{abCode}

SELECT SIA_SHCODE AS "SHCODE", SIA_ABCODE AS "ABCODE", AB_NAME AS "ABNAME", AB_GENDER AS ABGENDER, AB_PHONE AS "ABPHONE", TO_CHAR(SIA_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS "SIADATE", SIA_PAY AS "SIAPAY" FROM SIA INNER JOIN AB ON SIA.SIA_ABCODE = AB.AB_CODE WHERE SIA_SHCODE = #{shCode}
SELECT AC_ABCODE AS "ABCODE", AC_BANKNAME AS "ACBANKNAME", AC_ACCOUNT AS "ACACCOUNT" FROM AC WHERE AC_ABCODE = #{abCode}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM SS WHERE SS_SHCODE = #{shCode} and SS_ABCODE = #{abCode}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO SIA(SIA_SHCODE, SIA_ABCODE, SIA_MRGRADE, SIA_DATE, SIA_PAY, SIA_RESTTIME, SIA_ACCOUNT, SIA_BANKNAME) VALUES(#{shCode},#{abCode},#{mrGrade}, DEFAULT , #{siaPay}, #{restTime}, #{ssAccount}, #{ssBankName})
mapper.select: SELECT SS_SHCODE AS "SHCODE", SS_ABCODE AS "ABCODE", SS_BANKNAME AS "SSBANKNAME", SS_ACCOUNT AS "SSACCOUNT", AB_NAME AS "ABNAME", AB_BIRTH AS "ABBIRTH", AB_PHONE AS "ABPHONE", AB_ADDR AS "ABADDR", AB_GENDER AS "ABGENDER", AB_EMAIL AS "ABEMAIL" FROM SS INNER JOIN AB ON SS.SS_ABCODE = AB.AB_CODE WHERE SS_SHCODE = #{shCode} and SS_ABCODE = #{abCode}

SELECT SS_SHCODE AS "SHCODE", SS_ABCODE AS "ABCODE", AB_NAME AS "ABNAME", AB_PHONE AS "ABPHONE", AB_ADDR AS "ABADDR", AB_GENDER AS "ABGENDER", TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(AB_BIRTH),'YYYY-MM-DD') AS "ABBIRTH" FROM SS INNER JOIN AB ON SS.SS_ABCODE = AB.AB_CODE WHERE SS_SHCODE = #{shCode}
SELECT AB_NAME AS "ABNAME", LC_SIAABCODE AS "ABCODE", LC_SIASHCODE AS "SHCODE", LC_ROOT AS "LC_ROOT" FROM LC INNER JOIN AB ON LC.LC_SIAABCODE = AB_CODE WHERE LC_SIASHCODE = #{shCode}
SELECT LC_SIASHCODE AS "SHCODE", LC_SIAABCODE AS "ABCODE", LC_ROOT AS "LCROOT" FROM LC where (LC_SIASHCODE = #{shCode}) AND (LC_SIAABCODE= #{abCode})
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO LC(LC_SIASHCODE, LC_SIAABCODE, LC_ROOT) VALUES(#{shCode}, #{abCode}, #{lcRoot})
mapper.select: SELECT SIA_SHCODE AS "SHCODE", SIA_ABCODE AS "ABCODE", AB_NAME AS "ABNAME" FROM SIA INNER JOIN AB ON SIA.SIA_ABCODE = AB.AB_CODE WHERE SIA_SHCODE = #{shCode}

SELECT AB_NAME AS "ABNAME", CM_SCSHCODE AS "SHCODE", CM_SCABCODE AS "ABCODE", CM_SCSTARTTIME AS "STARTTIME", SC_ENDTIME AS "ENDTIME", TO_CHAR(CM_TIME,'YYYY-MM-DD_HH24:MI') AS "CMTIME", CM_TYPE AS "CMTYPE", CM_ROUND AS "CMROUND" FROM CM INNER JOIN SC ON (CM.CM_SCSHCODE = SC.SC_SIASHCODE) AND (CM.CM_SCABCODE = SC.SC_SIAABCODE) AND (CM.CM_SCSTARTTIME = SC.SC_STARTTIME) INNER JOIN AB ON CM.CM_SCABCODE = AB.AB_CODE WHERE (CM.CM_SCSHCODE = #{shCode}) AND (CM.CM_SCABCODE = #{abCode}) AND (CM.CM_TIME BETWEEN TO_DATE(#{startDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND TO_DATE(#{endDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD'))

SELECT SH_CODE AS "SHCODE", SH_NAME AS "SHNAME", SH_ADDR AS "SHADDR", SH_TEL AS "SHTEL", MN_NAME AS "MNNAME", SIA_ABCODE AS "ABCODE", AB_NAME AS "ABNAME" FROM SH INNER JOIN MN ON SH.SH_MNCODE = MN.MN_CODE INNER JOIN SIA ON SH.SH_CODE = SIA.SIA_SHCODE INNER JOIN AB ON SIA.SIA_ABCODE = AB.AB_CODE WHERE SH_CODE = #{shCode}

SELECT AB_CODE AS "ABCODE", AB_NAME AS "ABNAME", AB_PHONE AS "ABPHONE", AB_ADDR AS "ABADDR" FROM SIA INNER JOIN AB ON SIA.SIA_ABCODE = AB.AB_CODE WHERE SIA_SHCODE = #{shCode} AND SIA_ABCODE = #{abCode}
SELECT LC_SIASHCODE AS "SHCODE", LC_SIAABCODE AS "ABCODE", LC_ROOT AS "LCROOT" FROM LC WHERE LC_SIASHCODE = #{shCode} AND LC_SIAABCODE = #{abCode}
SELECT SH_CODE AS "SHCODE", SH_MNCODE AS "MNCODE", SH_NAME AS "SHNAME", MN_NAME AS "MNNAME" FROM SH INNER JOIN MN ON SH.SH_MNCODE = MN.MN_CODE WHERE MN_CODE= #{mnCode}

SELECT AB_CODE AS "ABCODE", SH_CODE AS "SHCODE", AB_NAME AS "ABNAME", SH_TYPE AS "SHTYPE", PD_PANAME AS "PANAME", PD_SIAPAY AS "APAY", PD_SIARESTTIME AS "RESTTIME", PD_TIMETOTAL AS "TIMETOTAL", PD_PAYTOTAL AS "PAYTOTAL" FROM PD INNER JOIN AB ON PD.PD_PAABCODE = AB.AB_CODE INNER JOIN SH ON PD.PD_PASHCODE = SH.SH_CODE WHERE PD_PASHCODE=#{shCode} AND PD_PAABCODE=#{abCode} AND PD_PANAME=#{paName}
SELECT SIA_SHCODE AS SHCODE, SIA_ABCODE AS ABCODE, AB_NAME AS ABNAME, SIA_PAY AS APAY, SIA_RESTTIME AS RESTTIME FROM SIA INNER JOIN AB ON SIA.SIA_ABCODE = AB.AB_CODE WHERE SIA_SHCODE=#{shCode}

select rd_rtshcode as SHCODE, rd_rtabcode as abCode, AB_NAME AS ABNAME, wl_scstarttime as workTime, rt_type as rtType,wl.wl_specialnote AS NOTE, rd_rttime as rtTime , rd_moneytype as moneyt, rd_moneycount as mCount FROM RD INNER JOIN rt ON rt.rt_siaabcode = rd.rd_rtabcode AND rt.rt_siashcode = rd.rd_rtshcode AND rt.rt_time = RD.RD_RTTIME INNER JOIN AB ON ab.ab_code = RD.RD_RTABCODE INNER JOIN WL ON rd.rd_rtshcode = WL.WL_scshcode AND RD.RD_RTABCODE = wl.wl_scabcode WHERE rt.rt_type ='2' AND TO_CHAR(RD.RD_RTTIME, 'YYYYMMDD') = '20210304' GROUP BY RD.RD_RTSHCODE,rd.rd_rtabcode,ab.ab_name, rt.rt_type,rd.rd_rttime,rd.rd_moneytype,rd.rd_moneycount,WL.WL_SPECIALNOTE,wl.wl_scstarttime ORDER BY wl.wl_specialnote,to_number(rd_moneytype) desc
SELECT MT_SHCODE AS SHCODE, MT_TLNUMBER AS "TLNUMBER", TL_COMMENT AS "TLCOMMENT", MT_DETAIL AS "MTDETAIL" FROM MT INNER JOIN TL ON MT.MT_TLNUMBER = TL.TL_NUMBER WHERE MT_SHCODE = #{shCode}

SELECT DISTINCT MTD.MTD_MTSHCODE AS SHCODE, MTD.MTD_MTTLNUMBER AS TLNUMBER , TL.TL_COMMENT AS TLCOMMENT, MTD.MTD_MTDETAIL AS MTDETAIL FROM MTD INNER JOIN TL ON MTD_MTTLNUMBER = TL_NUMBER WHERE MTD_MTSHCODE=#{shCode} AND MTD_MTTLNUMBER=#{tlNumber}
SELECT DISTINCT MTD.MTD_MTSHCODE AS SHCODE, MTD.MTD_MTTLNUMBER AS TLNUMBER , TL.TL_COMMENT AS TLCOMMENT FROM MTD INNER JOIN TL ON MTD_MTTLNUMBER = TL_NUMBER WHERE MTD_MTSHCODE=#{shCode}
SELECT SH_CODE AS SHCODE, SH_NAME AS SHNAME FROM SH WHERE SH_MNCODE = #{mnCode}
SELECT TL_NUMBER AS TLNUMBER, TL_COMMENT AS TLCOMMENT FROM TL
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MT (MT_SHCODE, MT_TLNUMBER, MT_DETAIL) VALUES(#{shCode}, #{tlNumber}, #{mtDetail})
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM MT WHERE MT_SHCODE = #{shCode} AND MT_TLNUMBER = #{tlNumber} AND MT_DETAIL = #{mtDetail}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PA(PA_SIASHCODE, PA_SIAABCODE, PA_NAME) VALUES(#{shCode}, #{abCode}, #{paName})

INSERT INTO PD (PD_PASHCODE, PD_PAABCODE, PD_PANAME, PD_SIAPAY, PD_SIARESTTIME, PD_TIMETOTAL, PD_PAYTOTAL, PD_STARTDATE, PD_ENDDATE) VALUES(#{shCode}, #{abCode}, #{paName}, #{aPay} , #{restTime} , #{timeTotal}, #{payTotal}, #{sTime}, #{eTime})
mapper.select: SELECT SH_CODE AS SHCODE, SH_NAME AS SHNAME FROM SH WHERE SH_MNCODE=#{mnCode}

SELECT SH_CODE AS SHCODE, AB_CODE AS ABCODE, SH_NAME AS SHNAME, AB_NAME AS ABNAME, MAX(PA_NAME) AS PANAME FROM PA INNER JOIN AB ON PA.PA_SIAABCODE = AB.AB_CODE INNER JOIN SH ON PA.PA_SIASHCODE = SH.SH_CODE WHERE PA_SIASHCODE=#{shCode} GROUP BY SH_CODE, AB_CODE, SH_NAME, AB_NAME

SELECT SH_CODE AS SHCODE, AB_CODE AS ABCODE, SH_NAME AS SHNAME, AB_NAME AS ABNAME, PA_NAME AS PANAME FROM PA INNER JOIN AB ON PA.PA_SIAABCODE = AB.AB_CODE INNER JOIN SH ON PA.PA_SIASHCODE = SH.SH_CODE WHERE PA_SIASHCODE=#{shCode} AND PA_NAME =#{paName}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM SC WHERE SC_SIASHCODE=#{shCode} AND SC_SIAABCODE=#{abCode} AND SC_STARTTIME = #{startTime} AND SC_STCODE = #{stCode}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO SC(SC_SIASHCODE, SC_SIAABCODE, SC_STARTTIME, SC_ENDTIME, SC_STCODE) VALUES(#{shCode}, #{abCode}, #{startTime}, #{endTime}, #{stCode})
mapper.select: SELECT count(*) FROM LC WHERE (LC_SIASHCODE = #{shCode}) AND (LC_SIAABCODE= #{abCode})

SELECT SC_SIASHCODE AS SHCODE, SC_SIAABCODE AS ABCODE, AB_NAME AS ABNAME, SC_STARTTIME AS STARTTIME, SC_ENDTIME AS ENDTIME FROM SC INNER JOIN AB ON SC_SIAABCODE = AB_CODE WHERE SC_SIASHCODE=#{shCode} AND SC_STCODE=#{stCode}

SELECT MTD_MTSHCODE AS SHCODE, MTD_MTTLNUMBER AS TLNUMBER, MTD_MTDETAIL AS MTDETAIL, MTD_ABCODE AS ABCODE, AB_NAME AS ABNAME, AB_GENDER AS ABGENDER FROM MTD INNER JOIN AB ON MTD_ABCODE = AB_CODE WHERE MTD_MTSHCODE=#{shCode} AND MTD_MTTLNUMBER=#{tlNumber} AND MTD_MTDETAIL=#{mtDetail}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM RD WHERE RD_RTSHCODE = #{shCode} AND RD_RTABCODE = #{abCode}
DELETE FROM RT WHERE RT_SIASHCODE = #{shCode} AND RT_SIAABCODE = #{abCode}
DELETE FROM PD WHERE PD_PASHCODE = #{shCode} AND PD_PAABCODE = #{abCode}
DELETE FROM WL WHERE WL_SCSHCODE = #{shCode} AND WL_SCABCODE = #{abCode}
DELETE FROM LC WHERE LC_SIASHCODE = #{shCode} AND LC_SIAABCODE = #{abCode}
DELETE FROM PA WHERE PA_SIASHCODE = #{shCode} AND PA_SIAABCODE = #{abCode}
DELETE FROM CM WHERE CM_SCSHCODE = #{shCode} AND CM_SCABCODE = #{abCode}
DELETE FROM SC WHERE SC_SIASHCODE = #{shCode} AND SC_SIAABCODE = #{abCode}
DELETE FROM SIA WHERE SIA_SHCODE = #{shCode} AND SIA_ABCODE = #{abCode}
DELETE FROM MTD WHERE MTD_MTSHCODE = #{shCode} AND MTD_ABCODE = #{abCode}
